general_advisory: Sow wheat and corn seeds. Take care of cattle during the rainy season.

advisory: Sow wheat seeds in well-drained soil.
Fertilize with nitrogen and potash for better growth.
Plant corn seeds at a depth of 1-2 inches.
Irrigate regularly to ensure proper growth.
Ensure cattle have access to shelter during rainy days.
Provide adequate nutrition and clean water for healthy growth.
